content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator x squared plus 1, and denominator, open parenthesis, x cubed, plus 3 x, minus 5, close parenthesis, cubed, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>
